trends: There have been 35 other sightings in Grants Pass
There were no other sightings in Grants Pass on or around August 30th 2007
divs: Sighting DetailsWhile I was watching T.V. I noticed a light out of the corner of my eye. When I turned to look out of the window which faces due west I noticed a light that started as quite dim then brightened almost like an airplane landing light then gradually disappear. It was approximately 3 times the height of the mountains which are about 70 miles away. At first I assumed that it was an airplane but it did not move. I went outside and watched for approximately another 5 minutes but it did not return. There were no airplanes or stars in the vicinity. Total time was approximately 8 - 10 seconds.
